item.title: ID-33 East at ID-28
item.description: ID-33 east at ID-28 north to Salmon. Continue east on ID-33 for Rexburg and West Yellowstone (Montana). This is the southern end of ID-33. The Sacajawea Historic Byway turns from ID-28 to ID-33 east here.

item.title: ID-33 East Approaching ID-28
item.description: ID-33 East approaching ID-28 in Jefferson County.

item.title: US-93 South at ID-28
item.description: US-93 south at ID-28 in Salmon. Turn right to continue south on US-93 to Challis and Sun Valley. Continue straight on Main St. for ID-28 South to Leadore and Idaho Falls.

item.title: US-93 South/To ID-28 - Main St. Jct.
item.description: US-93 South/To ID-28 at Main St. in Salmon. Turn left on Main St. to continue south on US-93 and for ID-28.

item.title: US-93 South/To ID-28 - Salmon
item.description: US-93 South/To ID-28 at Main St. in Salmon

item.title: US-93 North at ID-28
item.description: US-93 North at ID-28 south to Leadore. Turn left to continue north on US-93 to Hamilton (MT) and Missoula (MT).

item.title: ID-28 South at ID-29
item.description: ID-28 south at ID-29 east to Dillon (Montana). Continue south on ID-28 for Rexburg and Idaho Falls.

item.title: ID-28 South Approaching ID-29
item.description: ID-28 South approaching ID-29 in Leadore.

item.title: ID-28 South - Leadore
item.description: Entering Leadore - Population 105 on ID-28 south.

item.description: ID-28 South - 45th Parallel - Halfway Between The Equator and North Pole.

item.title: ID-28 South - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker on ID-28 south in Salmon. Distance to Baker, Tendoy, and Idaho Falls.

item.title: ID-28 South - Sacajawea Historic Byway

item.title: US-93 North at ID-28
item.description: US-93 North at ID-28 south to Leadore. Turn left to continue north on US-93 to Hamilton (MT) and Missoula (MT).

item.title: US-93 North Approaching ID-28
item.description: US-93 North approaching ID-28 in Salmon. Turn left to continue north on US-93; right for ID-28 south.

item.title: ID-33 East at ID-28
item.description: ID-33 east at ID-28 north to Salmon. Continue east on ID-33 for Rexburg and West Yellowstone (Montana). This is the southern end of ID-33. The Sacajawea Historic Byway turns from ID-28 to ID-33 east here.

item.title: ID-22 West at ID-28
item.description: ID-22 west at ID-28. ID-28 has a brown shield because it is part of the Sacajawea Historic Byway.
